General.Name: Zhejiang Jingxing Paper Joint Stock Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Jingxing Paper Joint Stock Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of paper products in China and internationally. It provides kraft liner boards, white top linerboards, bobbin base papers, corrugated base papers, corrugated cardboards, paper boxes, and other specialty papers, as well as household paper products under the Jingxing brand name. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Pinghu, China.
